entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:52 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
